metadata.creator: fuellsand
metadata.description: "this afternoon we went for eels" opens with a dominant rave-motive, cricketchirping and a neckbreaking rythmshift. The grumpy drums accentuate the synthline unobtrusively. "sun and paperindustry" is mainly build on a strongly repetitive glockenspiel pattern. Fieldrecording, heavy synthesizer chords and the jazzy voice of Lena create a song out of this tricky loop. The eels ep started the fuellsand ep-trilogy, in wich three eps with two songs each are to be released.
metadata.title: Fuellsand - Eels EP [12rec.006]
